details:
US-CERT/NIST reports:

> Integer signedness error in the base64\_decode function in the
> HTTP authentication functionality (http\_auth.c) in lighttpd 1.4
> before 1.4.30 and 1.5 before SVN revision 2806 allows remote
> attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault)
> via crafted base64 input that triggers an out-of-bounds read
> with a negative index.
summary: lighttpd -- remote DoS in HTTP authentication
